metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0925 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Gitlab Enterprise Edition version 10.1.0 is vulnerable to an insufficiently protected credential issue in the project service integration API endpoint resulting in an information disclosure of plaintext password.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
